data.title: Olivia Spencer
data.meta_description: Olivia Spencer (formerly Lewis, Spaulding & O'Neill) is a fictional character on the CBS daytime soap opera Guiding Light. Crystal Chappell (07/1999-09/2009) Slapped Alan Spaulding [Aug 24, 2001] Arrested for illegal stock transactions (charges dropped) [Dec 6, 2001] Slapped Alan [Dec 10, 2001...
data.text:
Olivia Spencer (formerly Lewis, Spaulding & O'Neill) is a fictional character on the CBS daytime soap opera Guiding Light.

Actress History:[]

Crystal Chappell (07/1999-09/2009)

Crimew Committed:[]

Slapped Alan Spaulding [Aug 24, 2001]

Arrested for illegal stock transactions (charges dropped) [Dec 6, 2001]

Slapped Alan [Dec 10, 2001]

Fought with Cassie Layne Winslow, in the mud, and later pulled Alan and Richard Winslow in with them [May 9-10, 2002]

Slapped Phillip Spaulding [Oct 7, 2002]

Spiked Alan's champagne with a sleeping pill [Feb 20, 2003]

Stranded Alan on Mystic Island with no cellphone and by cutting the phone lines [Feb 20 - 25, 2003]

Slapped Phillip (he asked her to) [Jul 22, 2004]

Committed fraud by marrying Bill Lewis in order to keep from being deported [Oct 14, 2004]

Slapped Billy Lewis [Nov 9, 2004]

Slapped Bill [Feb 9, 2005]

Slapped Bill [Apr 12, 2005]

Held Gus Aitoro at gunpoint [May 23-24, 2005]

Punched Reva Lewis [Jul 14, 2005]

Nearly pushed her daughter, Ava Peralta over a balcony during an argument [Sep 18, 2006]

While drunk, nearly ran down Ava with her car [Sep 20, 2006]

Hired a hit man to kill Ava [Sep 20, 2006]

Fled Springfield when a warrant was out for her arrest (for the near hit-and-run) [Sep 21, 2006]

Lured Ava to the Spaulding garage in an effort to get her killed [Sep 29, 2006]

With Jeffrey O'Neill, kidnapped Alan-Michael Spaulding to warn him away from Ava [Apr 16, 2007]

Slapped Jeffrey [May 9, 2007]

Character History[]
